price: Mwenyezi Mungu amewatengenezea Bustani zipitazo mito kati yake, wadumu humo. Huko ndiko kufuzu kukubwa.
arabic: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
footnotes: Na Mwenyezi Mungu amekwisha watengenezea katika Akhera neema za kudumu, katika Mabustani yanayo pitiwa na mito. Na huko ndiko kufuzu adhimu, na kufanikiwa kukubwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: aʿadda al-lahu lahum jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā dhālika al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
